= Introduction =

CSVParser is useful class to parse CSV file, the result will store in a `List<List<String>>` variable.

To use the CSVParser, you need to new a CSVParser instance first. Then set the properties to satisfy you requirement. Then call the parse method to get the result.

= Properties =

  * *textQualifier* `public String textQualifier {get; set;}` The character to use as a text qualifier in the data. for example, you can use the ' and ".
  * *delimiter* `public String delimiter {get; set;}`  The character to use as the column delimiter.
  * *escapeMode* `public String escapeMode {get; set;}`  The way to escape an occurance of the text qualifier inside qualified data. You can use CSVParser.ESCAPE_MODE_DOUBLED or CSVParser.ESCAPE_MODE_BACKSLASH.

= Methods =

  * *parse* `public List<List<String>> parse(String contents)`

= Constants =

  * *ESCAPE_MODE_DOUBLED* _static_
  * *ESCAPE_MODE_BACKSLASH* _static_
